A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
The combat\, the visuals\, and the music were fantastic and the movie could have been superb except for a few things.

- The marvel movie humor.  No thanks.
- Making Luke into what he was.  No thanks.
- Rose and that entire storyline.  No thanks.
- Purple haired admiral.  No thanks.
- The repetitive derailing of what the men wanted to do vs the women.   No thanks.

This really edges on white males vs minorities to an obnoxious degree.
